Eric Schmidt , who has headed up Google since July 2001, sent a message via Twitter Thursday saying: Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Co-founder Sergey Brin will focus on new products and projects. Google on Thursday also announced fourth quarter net income of$ 2.54 billion, or$ 7.81 a share, up from$ 1.97 billion,

're set to tape their first guest spot on Late Show with David Letterman on Monday. The show will air later that night.`` We are really, really excited about'' David Letterman , Meghan Linsey said. I grew up watching that show, and I feel like David Letterman is the holy grail. Steel Magnolia's Wildhorse Saloon album release show begins at 7:30 p.m. today. www.wildhorsesaloon.com. Fans can catch the duo on Late Show with David Letterman 10:35 p.m. Monday on CBS.-
